companyInfo.name: Srikanth Nursery and Laxmi Associates
companyInfo.mission: At Srikanth Nursery, our mission is to transform outdoor spaces into beautiful, sustainable, and functional environments that enrich the lives of our clients. We are committed to providing exceptional craftsmanship, innovative design, and a client-focused approach to every project, ensuring that we not only meet but exceed expectations.
companyInfo.vision: To be the leading landscape design and build firm in our region, recognized for our commitment to quality, environmental stewardship, and the creation of unique, lasting landscapes that inspire and delight.

contact.address: 203, Godavari block, Amrutha project, kompally-medchal dis - 500100

services.title: Central Median & Avenue Plantations
services.description: Professional highway and road beautification with strategic plant placement along central medians and roadsides.

services.title: Landscape Parks Development
services.description: Complete development of theme parks and colony parks with contemporary landscape design.

services.title: Lake Beautification
services.description: Transform lake fronts into stunning recreational areas with ecological balance.

services.title: Vertical Gardens
services.description: Innovative vertical garden solutions for urban spaces and building facades.

services.title: Residential & Commercial Landscape Design
services.description: Custom landscape design and implementation for homes and commercial properties.

services.title: Plant & Tree Material Supply
services.description: High-quality plants and trees from our extensive 20-acre nursery facility.

services.title: Irrigation Systems & Water Features
services.description: Advanced irrigation solutions and beautiful water features for landscape projects.

services.title: Regular Lawn & Garden Maintenance
services.description: Ongoing maintenance services to keep your landscapes healthy and beautiful.

projects.name: Gandipet Lake Front Park
projects.description: The Gandipet Lake front Park developed on the banks of Osman Sagar lake has been transformed into a famous tourist attraction. HMDA developed it into an Urban park with contemporary landscapes using effective coordination of landscape elements including Land Forms, Water Features, Pavement Materials, Site Amenities, Lighting and Signs.

projects.name: Warangal Highway NH-163
projects.description: The Warangal Highway is a vital transportation corridor connecting Warangal to other major cities. This project involved designing and implementing central medians and landscaping to improve safety, traffic flow, and aesthetics.

projects.name: Mayuri Nagar Rock Garden
projects.description: The Mayuri Nagar Rock garden situated at Miyapur has been developed into an Urban park with contemporary landscapes. The coordination and effective use of landscape elements contribute to the overall success of creating oneness and easy flow in the park.

projects.name: Jai Hind Colony Park
projects.description: The Jai Hind colony Park has been developed into an Urban park with contemporary landscapes, using effective coordination of landscape elements including Land Forms, Water Features, Pavement Materials, Site Amenities, Lighting and Signs.

projects.name: Gajwel Ring Road
projects.description: The Gajwel Ring road project involved designing and implementing central medians and landscaping to improve safety, traffic flow, and aesthetics along this vital transportation corridor.

projects.name: Nanded Highway NH-161
projects.description: The Nanded Highway (NH-161) beautification project involved comprehensive landscaping with central medians to improve safety, traffic flow, and aesthetics along this vital transportation corridor.
